|vendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |device_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = NDD9578221212 |icid = 2468C-AC240 |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = 80:1F:02
|chip1 = Realtek;RTL8812AU; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |802.11ac = 867 |802.11n = 300/300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 03/04/2013 |estreldate = 06/05/2013 |price = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 760559120511 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = N82E16833181289 |asin = B00D7FSRGE |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = China
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This device is clearly an [[Edimax EW-7822UAC]]. :The FCC ID of the EW-7822UAC has been assigned to this entry.
A 0586:3426 USB ID ''may'' be used for this device..
When viewing the USB connection information for this device it will show as being a USB2.0 device. Only when the wireless connects at the full speed of 802.11ac will the unit switch to USB3.0.
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews + etc=== *[http://www.overclockers.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/09/zyxel-37.jpg Shown @ '''Overclockers.com'''] ===Vendors=== *[http://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=N82E16833181289 On Newegg]
